article.title: The Smith Cloud: surviving a high speed transit of the Galactic disc

multiple_choice_question.text: What is the approximate maximum rotation speed of the hot halo in the model, as seen in the right panel of Figure 1?
What happens to the amplitude of the actual rotation curve of the gas disc at R â‰¥ 30 kpc compared to the target rotation curve?
choices: It departs from the target curve.

multiple_choice_question.text: According to Formula (1), if the mass of a spherical gas cloud is doubled while keeping its size and hydrogen fraction constant, what happens to its mean hydrogen density?

In RUN 2 (high-mass subhalo, high resolution), approximately what percentage of the initial gas mass is retained by the subhalo after its first disc transit, as shown in the central panel of Figure 7?
